content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 16.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe networks carrying water and steam
- Part of electrical network id 8094

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Collection chest at (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Copper Production Line at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Collection chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5)

### Iron Production Line 1 at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Collection chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Output inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5)

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Input inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Output inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Connected belt groups for material transport

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Always verify item existence in chest before attempting extraction
- Check if the production line for required items is working properly
- Implement better inventory tracking system

### Errors related to missing fuel
- Maintain adequate coal supply for all burner entities
- Implement regular fuel checking and refilling routine
- Consider setting up dedicated coal supply lines

### Production line stalling issues
- Monitor and maintain fuel levels in mining drills and inserters
- Ensure proper placement of all components in production chains
- Verify resource patches are properly aligned with mining drills

### Assembling machine ingredient shortages
- Ensure reliable supply of all required ingredients before starting production
- Monitor input chest inventory levels
- Set up proper item transport systems between storage and assembly machines

### Research facility issues
- Verify science pack production and transport before attempting research
- Ensure lab has power connection
- Maintain consistent science pack supply chain
